::: {.dbox data-latex='{Definition}'}
A **relation** $R$ from the set $X$ to a set $Y$ is a rule that assigns to each element of $X$ at least one element of $Y$.  
:::

```{=tex}
\fonter{60pt}
\begin{itemize}
 \item[] $X$ is called the \textit{\bfseries domain} of $R$
 \item[] $Y$ is called the \textit{\bfseries co-domain} of $R$
\end{itemize}
```

::: {.dbox data-latex='{Definition}'}
The **range** of a relation $R$ is the set of all elements in the co-domain $Y$ that is assigned to some element in the domain $X$.
:::
